Job description

Avon — больше, чем просто работа. Avon — это стиль жизни! Добро пожаловать в мир красоты и интересных проектов, дружной атмосферы и простора для реализации своих целей.

В связи с развитием компании в отделе продаж открывается вакансия «Менеджер по аналитике продаж, Украина и Грузия»

Что входит в обязанности?

  • Управление и координация работы группы аналитики отдела Продаж в Украине и Грузии, обеспечение предоставления поддержки менеджмента по стратегическим инициативам и полевым программам отдела Продаж;
  • Оценка результатов компании в диапазоне двух рынков AVON -Украины и Грузии, определение их потенциала;
  • Внедрение стандартизации процессов аналитики продажи для двух стран;
  • Создание и поддержка статистических и аналитических баз данных ;
  • Организация поддержки процесса полевого планирования;
  • Участие в процессе S&OP
  • Руководство разработкой системы принципов анализа, оценки и прогнозирования основных показателей работы поля, коммуникация результатов продаж и прогнозов, предоставление рекомендаций менеджменту;
  • Расчёт и анализ инициатив, поощрительных программ и мероприятий с целью прогнозирования и оценки их эффективности с подготовкой соответствующих бизнес кейсов и презентаций.
  • Координирует работу группы аналитики отдела Продаж в Украине и Грузии, распределяет нагрузку между аналитиками, управляет процессами мотивации и развития аналитиков отдела продаж.

Вы НАШ кандидат, если у вас есть:

  • Высшее образование;
  • Владение английским языком на уровне Upper-Intermediate+
  • Опыт работы аналитиком от 2 лет, опыт управления персоналом;
  • Отличное владение Excel, Power Point, SQL;
  • Понимание статистических методов;
  • Большим преимуществом будет знание языков, алгоритмов программирования;
  • Опыт работы с системой Tableau, PowerBl или другими CRM\Bl системами

Личностные знания и навыки: внимательность к деталям, мультизадачность, эффективность, быстрая обучаемость, инициативность, проактивность, способность принимать (сложные) решения.

От компании вы получите

  • Официальное трудоустройство
  • Социальные гарантии согласно трудовому законодательству
  • 30 дней отпуска, оплачиваемые больничные
  • Страхование жизни и медицинская страховка
  • Подарки на праздники
  • Оплачиваемые обеды
  • Корпоративная развозка с Борисполя и м.Харьковская

Место работы: с. Счастливое, ул. Харьковское шоссе 5

Job description

Candidate Profile:

  • 2 years' experience in a related field/role (Analyst/ BA);
  • Good commercial acumen, previous experience of working directly with Business Owners is an advantage;
  • Ability to analyze and translate data into business propositions enabling customers to drive their revenue targets;
  • Experience in designing and generating detail reporting and real-time Dashboard components adhering to best practice and leading industry standards;
  • Strong MS Excel/MS Power Point competency;
  • At least Intermediate English level (written and spoken);
  • Previous experience of designing and implementing rule based techniques;
  • Technical and Business Background preferred.

Responsibilities:

  • Permanently review and develop test cases/scenarios logic, rules and schedule of different mobile and web based applications/services which generate International A2P SMS traffic;
  • Carry out regular market Intelligence on mobile and web based applications/services;
  • Design and implement activity (test traffic) reports on the fly in order to deep dive into trend irregularities/discrepancies and establish what driving anomalist traffic activity and eliminate it;
  • Carry out daily checks of all test activities for testing team members to minimize revenue leakage and report on it;
  • Day-by-day control of the testing process — possible issues analysis and resolution related to test devices, test tools, correspondent resources (SIM-cards etc.);
  • Continually design and implement intelligent rule based analytics to detect, alert and ultimately eliminate irregular/fraud activity within generated and managed SMS traffic;
  • Carry out regular Trend analysis on A2P traffic looking for activity that would not be aligned with seasonal characteristics, growth patterns, new applications and established trends;
  • Regularly present dynamic and real time data analysis reporting;
  • The ability to work with MNO & aggregators to resolve billing discrepancies in a transparent way with supporting documentation based on own analytic reports, patterns and trends;
  • Close engagement with other team members to ensure new reporting feature requirements are developed, tested and implemented for current and new customers

Job description

A MySQL Database Analyst is required to form part of our growing technology team to provide administration, support and strategic guidance on MySQL databases for an enterprise grade, online e-commerce platform.The postholder should have proven experience in a similar role and be comfortable working on both project and operational tasks to support the business. You will need to foster internal and external business relationships, understand complex requirements and communicate effectively at all times.Key Responsibilities:
Reviewing and suggesting DDL for new features in line with SQL coding standards and best database performance for the development team
Deploying DDL changes for new features to staging and production environments
Optimising any slow and inefficient queries which are identified and suggesting improvements to the development team 
Ensuring service availability through 24/7 on-call
Following and updating, where necessary, in-house procedure and environment documentation on Confluence
Reviewing and suggesting DDL for new features in line with SQL coding standards and best database performance
Advising development teams on possible implementations for new features at the planning stage
Configuring database credentials in dev, staging and production platforms for applications and providing database credentials to the Devops team
Configuring developer access to development environments and distributing credentials
Configuring developer and Data Analyst access to the data warehouse and production environment for production reports
Tracking Data Analyst requests for GDPR sensitive data, seeking authorization where necessary
Following a continuous improvement goal to keep all database systems as up to date as possible through researching changes in new versions, testing new versions with the development team and proposing / actioning live upgrade plans (expecting all platforms to have at least one upgrade per year)
Regularly auditing instance usage and ensuring monetary and resource costs are understood with stakeholders
Following a Change Approval Board approval process for any live service affecting change ensuring that changes are understood by all stakeholders and approved by management
Essential Competencies/skills and experiences for the role:
Oracle Certified Professional (MySQL 5.7 Database Administrator) or equivalent
Ability to optimise and suggest alternatives to MySQL queries (data, table and index assessment, explain plan, knowledge of covering indexes, hash indexes, derived tables, factors affecting temporary table requirements, query hints, index hints)
Ability to manage own workloads and priorities well
Ability to engage with a variety of stakeholders, maintaining a professional «can do» approach at all times
Desirable Competencies/skills and experiences for the role:
Maintenance of supporting in-house scripts and data feeds for database monitoring and binary log housekeeping purposes
Experience of working with Business Intelligence Platforms such as PowerBI and Business Objects
Experience of supporting Financial Reporting and Reconciliation activity
Experience of working in an Ecommerce environment
Good understanding of GDPR and other data protection regulations
We can offer:
Working in one of the four largest IT companies in Belarus
Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
Career development system with clear skill qualifications
Flexible working hours aligned to your schedule
Employment benefits

5.5 km from center · Find on the map

Full-time, people with disabilities welcome. Work experience more than 1 year.

Job description

ОБОВ’ЯЗКИ:

  • вивчення будови і функціонування поточних систем компанії;
  • збір вимог з різних джерел, інтерв'ювання замовників;
  • взаємодія з замовниками та експертами предметних областей (організація, ведення та протоколювання нарад);
  • аналіз вимог для контролю їх якості;
  • документування вимог — постановка завдань на розробку / доопрацювання ПЗ;
  • створення прототипів користувальницького інтерфейсу;
  • узгодження вимог із зацікавленими особами.

ВИМОГИ:

  • вища освіта;
  • досвід роботи на аналогічній посаді від 1 року (або без досвіду);
  • досвід написання документації для розробки/доробки ПО;
  • навички роботи з Microsoft Office: Word, Excel, Outlook, Access, Visio, Project;
  • знання основних методологій розробки ПО (Waterfall, Scrum, Kanban);
  • знання нотацій/мов модулювання. Наприклад — BPMN/UML;
  • аналітичне мислення і вміння систематизувати інформацію.

МИ ПРОПОНУЄМО:

  • графік роботи: пн-пт з 9 до 18, сб-нд вихідні;
  • гідну офіційну заробітну плату;
  • добровільне медичне страхування;
  • знижки для співробітників мережі;
  • спеціальна цінова пропозиція від великих спортивних комплексів, з подальшою компенсацією з боку компанії;
  • веселі і цікаві корпоративні свята;
  • корпоративний транспорт від ст.м. Дарниця, Чернігівська, Лісова і Дарницької пл.

ПОБАЖАННЯ З ПРИВОДУ ЗАРОБІТНОЇ ПЛАТИ ВКАЗУЙТЕ У РЕЗЮМЕ.

Офіс з просування експорту України, ДУ
Consulting, auditing, and accounting; 10-50 employees

Kyiv

Full-time, part-time, remote, students welcome. Unfinished higher education.

Job description

Офіс з просування експорту (Export Promotion Office, EPO) — це державна інституція з підтримки українських виробників товарів та послуг на міжнародних ринках, яка допомагає компаніям перейти від разових експортних контрактів до системних довгострокових продажів.

Стажування в ЕРО — це шанс долучитися до команди висококваліфікованих професіоналів, що допомагають українським експортно-орієнтованим компаніям підкорювати міжнародні ринки. Ми є частиною урядової механізму реалізації економічної політики держави, та рок за роком доводимо свою ефективність, застосовуючи кращі міжнародні практики та надаючи можливість українським підприємствам представляти свою продукцію та послуги потенційним партнерам при особистих зустрічах на обраному закордонному ринку.

Ми розуміємо як важливо мати можливість попрактикуватись, та перетворити університетські знання у відпрацьовані навички та відточити їх на реальних прикладах, отримати підтримку менторів, які направлять та підкажуть.

Під час стажування, для вас буде розроблено індивідуальний план роботи в команді Офісу, з постійною менторською підтримкою.

Особиста вмотивованість та працьовитість — є ключовим критерієм відбору. Наявність досвіду — другорядний фактор — ми готові ділитися досвідом!

Ми пропонуємо:

  1. Стажування в команді професіоналів тривалістю до 3-х місяців;
  2. Цікаві завдання та можливості реалізовувати власні ідеї;
  3. Індивідуальний графік роботи;
  4. Участь в навчальних заходах ЕРО та інших заходах для бізнесу;
  5. Участь у розбудові експортної екосистеми України та змінах нашої держави;
  6. Можливість дистанційного стажування.

Зверніть увагу, що стажування є неоплачуваним.

Наш ідеальний кандидат/кандидатка:

  • Студент\ка, які закінчили 4−5 курс та продовжують навчатись на наступному освітньо-кваліфікаційному рівні (спеціальності: економіка, міжнародна економіка або інші);
  • З аналітичним складом мислення, здатністю працювати в режимі багатозадачності та працювати в команді;
  • Впевнений користувач\ка Word, Exel,;
  • Володіє організаторськими навичками;
  • Любить працювати з великими масивами даних, текстовою інформацією;
  • Вільно володіє українською та англійською мовами (письмова, розмовна);
  • Сумлінно виконує обов’язки та відмінно дотримується дедлайнів.

Надсилайте резюме або інформацію про себе українською мовою на адресу [apply]

Обов’язково вказати у темі листа «Стажування в EPO».

Job description

Mementia provides eCommerce website business consulting, website building and design, technical support (bug-fixing, helping with common tasks), maintenance (upgrades, redesign, extension installation), testing, digital marketing services, SEO, inventory management and ERP (Enterprise Resource Management) solutions, and more. With us, our clients can focus on their business and let us take care of the technical and other chores.Mementia is a self-management organization using Holacracy. Holacracy is a new way of structuring and running your organization that replaces the conventional management hierarchy. Instead of operating top-down, power is distributed throughout the organization, giving individuals and teams more freedom to self-manage, while staying aligned to the organization’s purpose.Mementia is looking for a Business Analyst to join the team.​Responsibilities:
Communication with the Product Owner, identifying requirements
Performing research and finding solutions for business problems and needs

Capturing business requirements
Writing technical tasks
Writing instructions, feature documentation, and release notes
Requirements:
Experience with eCommerce (as BA, admin, or developer)
English — upper-intermediate (both spoken and written)

1+ year of the business analysis experience in IT
Experience with JIRA or similar software

Excellent analytical skills and critical thinking.

Knowledge of BA techniques and Agile methodology

Good written and verbal communication skills

Problem solving and decision-making abilities

Knowledge of negotiation and facilitation techniques
NOTICE: Experience with Magento is a big advantageValue Proposition to the Applicant:
Free schedule, remote work
Holacracy and Badge-based compensation
Nominate yourself for new and better skills = increase your salary
Get rewarded for loyalty and good KPIs
Get perks, such as paid days off, training and certification, and other goodies

Match a minimum number of hours per week (6 productive per day on average for full-time)
Get paid based on the hours logged (USD)

Mementia
IT; less than 10 employees

Kyiv

Full-time, remote, students welcome, people with disabilities welcome. Work experience more than 1 year.

Job description

Mementia provides eCommerce website business consulting, website building and design, technical support (bug-fixing, helping with common tasks), maintenance (upgrades, redesign, extension installation), testing, digital marketing services, SEO, inventory management and ERP (Enterprise Resource Management) solutions, and more. With us, our clients can focus on their business and let us take care of the technical and other chores.

Mementia is a self-management organization using Holacracy. Holacracy is a new way of structuring and running your organization that replaces the conventional management hierarchy. Instead of operating top-down, power is distributed throughout the organization, giving individuals and teams more freedom to self-manage, while staying aligned to the organization’s purpose.

Mementia is looking for a Business Analyst to join the team.

​Responsibilities:

  • Communication with the Product Owner, identifying requirements
  • Performing research and finding solutions for business problems and needs
  • Capturing business requirements
  • Writing technical tasks
  • Writing instructions, feature documentation, and release notes

Requirements:

  • Experience with eCommerce (as BA, admin, or developer)
  • English — upper-intermediate (both spoken and written)
  • 1+ year of the business analysis experience in IT
  • Experience with JIRA or similar software
  • Excellent analytical skills and critical thinking.
  • Knowledge of BA techniques and Agile methodology
  • Good written and verbal communication skills
  • Problem solving and decision-making abilities
  • Knowledge of negotiation and facilitation techniques

NOTICE: Experience with Magento is a big advantage

Value Proposition to the Applicant:

  • Free schedule, remote work
  • Holacracy and Badge-based compensation
    • Nominate yourself for new and better skills = increase your salary
    • Get rewarded for loyalty and good KPIs
    • Get perks, such as paid days off, training and certification, and other goodies
  • Match a minimum number of hours per week (6 productive per day on average for full-time)
  • Get paid based on the hours logged (USD)

UNDP
Non-profit organizations; 250-1000 employees

Kyiv, Кловський узвіз, 1.

Full-time. Work experience more than 1 year. Higher education.

Job description

Operations and Compliance Analyst UNDP/RBEC/Ukraine, Fixed Term Appointment (FTA), NOA; Duty station — Kyiv, Ukraine

Deadline for applications — 13 October 2020

Apply here:

https://jobs.partneragencies.net/erecruitjobs.html?JobOpeningId=32849&;HRS_JO_PST_SEQ=1&hrs_site_id=2

Duties and Responsibilities

Summary of Key Functions:

❑ Supports Operations Manager in the strategic direction of operations and oversight over the implementation and compliance with the Internal Control Framework

❑ Supports Operations Manager in Financial resources management and oversight of the Finance team

❑ Supporting Operations Manager in Human Resources Management and oversight of the HR team

❑ Supports Operations Manager in Efficient procurement and logistical services and oversight of the Procurement team

❑ Leading implementation of OAI recommendations and monitoring management response to OAI observations for transparent and efficient delivery.

1. Supports Operations Manager in the strategic direction of operations and oversight over the implementation and compliance with the Internal Control Framework, focusing on achievement of the following results:

❑ Compliance of operations with UN/UNDP rules, regulations and policies, implementation of corporate operational strategies, establishment of management targets (BSC) and monitoring achievement of results.

❑ Provision of advice on strategies, policies and plans affecting CO operations, delivery of practice advisory, knowledge and learning services.

❑ Establishment of collaborative arrangements with potential partners, a Client Relationship Management System for resource mobilization purposes and appropriate operational partnership arrangements.

❑ CO business processes mapping and oversight over compliance with the internal Standard Operating Procedures in Finance, Human Resources Management, Procurement, Logistical and ICT services, Results Management.

❑ Constant monitoring and analysis of the operating environment, quick readjustment of the operations, advice on legal considerations and risk assessment.

❑ Knowledge building and sharing with regards to management and operations in the CO, organization of the operations staff trainings, synthesis of lessons learnt/best practices, and sound contributions to UNDP knowledge networks and communities of practice.

2. Supports Operations Manager in the effective and accurate financial resources management and oversight of the Finance team, focusing on achievement of the following results:

❑ Oversight over implementation and compliance with the revamped Internal Control Framework for management of financial resources.

❑ Proper planning, expenditures tracking and audit of financial resources in accordance with UNDP rules and regulations, acts as OM substitute if needed in performing the function of Manager Level 2 in Atlas for vouchers and replenishments approval, deals management and bank reconciliations. Approval of pending disbursements as the «third authority» (cheques, bank transfers, EFT). Approval of bank reconciliations.

❑ Management of cost-recovery system for the services provided by the CO to projects and other UN Agencies. Accurate planning, forecasting and reporting of extra-budgetary income.

❑ Organization and oversight of CO cash management processes, including liquidity management, recommendation of interest level, risk assessment, bank relationship management; timely accounting and reconciliation of all transactions, security for cash assets on site.

❑ Member of the bank signatory panel.

❑ Routinely monitors financial exception reports for unusual activities, transactions, and investigates anomalies or unusual transactions. Informs supervisors and other UNDP staff at Headquarters of the results of the investigation when satisfactory answers are not obtained.

3. Supports Operations Manager in the strategic human resources management and oversight of the HR team focusing on achievement of the following results:

❑ Oversight over implementation and compliance with the revamped Internal Control Framework for human resources management processes.

❑ CO compliance with corporate human resources policies and strategies.

❑ Assessment and providing recommendations to CO Senior Management of the optimal staffing of the office and projects.

❑ Oversight of recruitment processes and performance management systems ensuring link of job design with recruitment, performance management and career development.

4. Supports Operations Manager in the efficient procurement and logistical services management and oversight of the Procurement team focusing on achievement of the following results:

❑ Oversight over implementation of and compliance with the revamped Internal Control Framework for procurement and logistical services management.

❑ Monitoring of CO compliance with corporate rules and regulations in the field and management of the CO procurement strategies including sourcing strategy, supplier selection and evaluation, quality management, customer relationship management, e-procurement promotion and introduction, performance measurement.

❑ Monitoring of the CO contract strategy including tendering processes and evaluation, managing the contract and contractor, legal implications. Oversight of procurement processes and logistical services in accordance with UNDP rules and regulations, OM acting as Manager Level 2 in Atlas for Purchase orders approvals.

❑ Proper monitoring of UNDP assets, facilities and logistical services.

5. Leads implementation of OAI recommendations and monitoring of management response to OAI observations, focusing on achievement of the following results:

❑ Serves as a CO focal point on implementation of audit-mandated and compliance tasks in support of the Operations Manager and Senior Management,

❑ Ensures full compliance with UNDP rules, regulations and policies of financial activities, financial recording/reporting system and follows up on audit recommendations, implementation of effective internal controls, proper functioning of a client oriented financial resources management system;

❑ Ensures oversight and regular monitoring of procurement, human resources, finance processes to ensure that they performed in accordance with recommendations of the OAI and corporate standards;

❑ Ensures oversight and quality assurance of procurement, human resources, finance processes conducted by the programme and projects personnel, in accordance with corporate standards of segregation of duties and in compliance with OAI recommendations;

❑ Maintains filing, storage and archiving of documentation, consistent with the standards and practices of the OAI office;

❑ Monitors and contributes to management response to the OAI recommendations

More Information:

https://jobs.partneragencies.net/erecruitjobs.html?JobOpeningId=32849&;HRS_JO_PST_SEQ=1&hrs_site_id=2
